snippet: Even with their immense home-field advantage, and Peyton Manning’s passing, the short-handed Broncos face a tall task in beating the Ravens.
abstract: Preview of upcoming matchup between Baltimore Ravens and Denver Broncos.
lead_paragraph: Even with their immense home-field advantage, and Peyton Manning’s passing, the short-handed Broncos face a tall task in beating the Ravens.

headline.main: Thursday’s Matchup: Baltimore Ravens at Denver Broncos
headline.print_headline: Thursday’s Matchup: Baltimore Ravens at Denver Broncos
